game_description: This VR multiplayer simulation was created by Tagmavisions for lumbar endoscopy training. The app is under development in collaboration with University of SÃ£o Paulo Endoscopy Specialization Course. Medical image reconstructions were included in the virtual environment and the main activities were included for puncture and approach training. A multi player environment offers conditions for real time interaction and case discussions. Funding by FAPESP (2020/05306-4).
